ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.B.DE153Assessment and provision of vaccinationsOffer other clinical services - Assessment and provision of vaccinations

HIV.B.DE158Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiologyOffer other clinical services - Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology

HIV.C.DE141Hepatitis B virus (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatmentOffer other clinical services - Hepatitis B virus (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatment

HIV.C.DE144Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TBOffer other clinical services - Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB
HIV.C.DE145Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiologyOffer other clinical services - Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Offer other clinical services element
